code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MileageForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const num=Number(value.replace(",","."));if(!isNaN(num)&&num>=0){onSubmit(num);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"mileage-input",children:"Quantos quil\xF4metros seu carro tem atualmente:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"mileage-input",type:"number",min:"0",value:value,onChange:e=>setValue(e.target.value),placeholder:"Ex: 123456",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Calcular"})]});};export default MileageForm;
